snippet.title: [E3 2010] - Lucha Libre AAA: Heroes del Ring Trailer
snippet.description:
Lucha Libre AAA: Heroes del Ring is an action sports game based on Mexican sport of 'Lucha Libre' style wrestling. Featuring all of the most popular 'luchadores' from Mexico's premiere wrestling federation, the game offers fans of existing wrestling franchises a unique gaming experience.

The game also features an evolved popularity-based scoring system which allows players to unlock increasingly acrobatic and devastating moves based on the user's ability to gain the support of the audience through the execution of taunts and grapple holds throughout the match.

Whether playing as any of the real-life AAA wrestlers or as a character they have created themselves, gamers will find in Lucha Libre AAA: Heroes del Ring a true lucha libre gaming experience for the first time

© 2010 Konami Digital Entertainment. KONAMI is a registered trademark of KONAMI CORPORATION. The ratings icon is a registered trademark of the Entertainment Software Association. 

© 2010 Gamexpress Latin America LLC / Televisa, S.A. de C.V. / Producciones Antonio Peña, S.A. de C.V. All rights reserved. AAA™ is a trademark of Producciones Antonio Peña, S.A. de C.V.  Heroes del Ring™ is a trademark of Gamexpress Latin America LLC. Certain of the elements of this videogame are used under license from Producciones Antonio Peña, S.A. de C.V.
